name: Mexican High School Simulator
description:
Explore the school of Conalep # 169 located in Tepic Nayarit Mexico!

Simulator of the preparatory school of Conalep 169 located in Tepic Nayarit.

Explore every classroom in the school, get ready to return to classes, stop by, and enjoy the graphics that have been optimized for smartphones.
Delve into the life of a Mexican student, when walking the corridors of this school interact with the various objects, drive a car and have fun.
